photo.label: photo
photo.description: Photo mode is used for capturing high-quality still images. It offers full control over exposure, focus, and image format. Supported formats include JPEG, HEIF, and RAW, enabling both quick sharing and professional-grade editing. Features like silent shutter, aspect ratio selection, and autofocus customization enhance creative flexibility.

video.label: video
video.description: Video mode enables high-quality movie recording with flexible control over resolution, frame rate, and audio. It supports features like Log profiles (S-Log3, HLG), manual focus, real-time tracking, and audio input monitoring. Ideal for professional video production or content creation.

features: Picture Profiles including S-Log3 and HLG
Manual focus peaking and zebra display

s&q.label: s&q
s&q.description: S&Q mode (Slow & Quick Motion) lets you record video at frame rates faster or slower than playback speed, enabling in-camera slow-motion or fast-motion effects without post-processing. It's perfect for capturing dramatic or accelerated action creatively and efficiently.

features: Direct slow or quick motion recording
Support for XAVC S and other formats
